title: How to Draw a Harp

steps.headline: Draw the base, and a strange mitten shape coming up from the base.
Draw 2 bars going up the sides on the inside of the mitten shape.
Draw a swirly design on the inside of the top of the mitten shape.
Draw the base to connect the strings to.
Draw the outline and the strings.

text: Draw the base, and a strange mitten shape coming up from the base.  Draw 2 bars going up the sides on the inside of the mitten shape.  Draw a swirly design on the inside of the top of the mitten shape.  Draw the base to connect the strings to.  Draw the outline and the strings.  Erase your sketch lines.  Finished.
